Summary: Oval craft white stationary lights, multi colored spinning lights floats over trees
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Kingsport
There were no other sightings in Kingsport on or around February 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsFirst seen along a ridge, moving fast. As it crossed 11W from a distance in front of us we saw multiple lights. Due to it's low flight we figured it was a helicopter. As we neared the IBEW the craft moved back across and we could tell it was circular. 4 white lights (bright) were stationary and below was what appeared to be a spinning section of the craft with smaller lights that varied in color. Craft glided over tree tops in a descending manner. We sped up and took the next road and it disappeared over a ridge. We attempted to locate it afterward with no success.
